CloudNet is the next generation of Minecraft Java and Bedrock cloud systems.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Cloudnet Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server

curl -OJLo CloudNet.zip https://github.com/CloudNetService/CloudNet-v3/releases/${CLOUDNET_VERSION}/download/CloudNet.zip
unzip -o CloudNet.zip

rm start.bat start.command start.sh CloudNet.zip
